title: How to Increase the Capacity of Your Pendrive

steps.title: Go to Start ->Run -> cmd and press Enter.
steps.content: Go to Start ->Run -> cmd and press Enter.

steps.title: Type convert X:
steps.content: Type convert X: /FS:NTFS ( Where X is your Pen Drive Letter)

steps.title: Go to "My Computer".
steps.content: Go to "My Computer". Right click on your Pen Drive icon and select "Properties".

steps.title: Select Compress Drive to Save Disk Space and then OK.
steps.content: Select Compress Drive to Save Disk Space and then OK.

steps.title: Then select "Apply To Sub Folders and Files" and select ok (if asked).
steps.content: Then select "Apply To Sub Folders and Files" and select ok (if asked).
